data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: Despite the name, Italian suits normally refer to only suits found in northeastern Italy (essentially around the former Republic of Venice) while the rest of the country uses Spanish (Sardinia and the south), French (northwest), or German (South Tyrol) suits. They ____ most ____ found ____ packs ____ 40 ____ but 52 card ____ are ____ available. The Tarocco Piemontese ____ Tarocco Bolognese have 78 and 62 cards ____. Unlike ____ French ____, ____ Italian ____ do ____ have ____ numbers ( or ____ ) ____ their ____. The cards' value is determined by identifying the face card or counting the number of pips.
data.partBlankContent: Despite the name, Italian suits normally refer to only suits found in northeastern Italy (essentially around the former Republic of Venice) while the rest of the country uses Spanish (Sardinia and the south), French (northwest), or German (South Tyrol) suits. They a__ most comm____ found i_ packs o_ 40 ca___ but 52 card se__ are al__ available. The Tarocco Piemontese a__ Tarocco Bolognese have 78 and 62 cards respec______. Unlike t__ French de__, so__ Italian ca___ do n__ have a__ numbers ( or let____ ) ident______ their va___. The cards' value is determined by identifying the face card or counting the number of pips.
data.answer: 尽管名为“意大利西装”，但意大利西装通常只指意大利东北部地区(主要是前威尼斯共和国周边地区)的西装，而该国其他地区使用西班牙西装(撒丁岛和南部地区)、法国西装(西北部地区)或德国西装(南蒂罗尔地区)。它们通常是一副40张的纸牌，但也有52套纸牌可供选择。塔罗克皮埃蒙特塔罗克和波隆尼塔罗克分别有78张和62张卡片。与法国牌不同，一些意大利牌没有任何数字(或字母)来标识它们的值。牌的价值是通过识别面牌或计算点数来确定的。
